contest-event.event-date:
July 1, 1899 D Penshaw Contest
Penshaw Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Penshaw Contest penshaw-contest
None
Donizetti [arr. Round]
Penshaw, County Durham 9 bands entered, 5 competed
1st prize £10 and euphonium valued at £12.12s. 2nd prize £2.10s. and cornet valued at £9.9s. 3rd prize £1.10s. 4th prize 10s.
March contest 1st (£1) Birtley Temperance, 2nd (10s.) Rise Carr.
Quartette contest 1st (£1) Rise Carr, 2nd (10s.) Ryhope.
April 14, 2012, 11:36 a.m. Aug. 9, 2013, 4:39 p.m.
1 Eston Miners Charles Henry Kay
2 Rise Carr W. H. Crowther
3 Sunderland Temperance James Thurlow
4 Birtley Temperance George Perry
5 Brancepeth Welfare Band Unknown
